metadata.title: CVE-2021-47332 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: usx2y: Don't call free_pages_exact() with NULL addressUnlike some other functions, we can't pass NULL pointer tofree_pages_exact().  Add a proper NULL check for avoiding possibleOops.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
